entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
